original_text:
You have fed them with the bread of tears;
    you have made them drink tears by the bowlful.
korean_text: 주께서 그들에게 눈물의 양식을 먹이시며 많은 눈물을 마시게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: You have fed them with the bread of tears;
you have made them drink tears by the bowlful.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 그릇 가득 눈물을 마시게 하셨습니다.
